subject: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Attn: Beneficiary,
Compliment of the day. My name is Dr .  Patrick Fisher, Deputy
Governor, CBN. I was mandated by the President Federal Republic of
Nigeria 2 days ago, in conjunction with the Federal Executive Council
(FEC), the Senate Committee on Foreign Debts Reconciliation and
Implementation Panel on Contract/inheritance/compensation payments to
complete all long over due unpaid Contract/inheritance/lottery fund
within 48 hours. I wish to congratulate you for a successful
completion of your payment process. You are advised to contact the
head of ICT department (Dr Mrs. Marina Luda) of Inter switch for the
final release of your approved $8,600,000.00 United States Dollars
only via their online internet banking platform, powered by western
union server. You can contact him urgently via email:
Contact Person:-----Dr Mrs. Marina Luda
Email:------ 
mrsmarinaluda128@gmail.com
We apologize for any delay you might have encountered in the past
trying to receive your payment. All thanks to God, your payment is now
100% Guaranteed. Kindly update us as you communicate with Inter
switch.
Best Regards,
Dr .  Patrick Fisher
Deputy Governor, Financial System Stability,
Central Bank of Nigeria.
NB: KINDLY NOTE THAT SOME PEOPLE (FRAUDSTERS) HAVE STARTED MAKING
FORGERY OF MY GOOD NAME.

subject: Re:   Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Dr. Patrick Fisher,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am glad to hear that the payment process is now successful.

However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding further. Could you please provide more details about the contract lottery fund? Also, could you please explain how the online internet banking platform powered by Western Union server works?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ginger

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Attention  Ginger,

Thank  you for your reply back to us with out your account details for the
release of your fund ( 10.5m dollars). but like as i have said from day
 that what stopped you from having your fund released to you since is that
the people you have worked in the past did not tell you truth . so now what
we only have to confirm from you is that if you have this three documents
that will back up your fund once it is released and transfer into your
account. so let us know now if you have this documents as it is below here
updated from 8th Jan 2024 but if you do not  have them let me know so that
the bank lawyer can get them on your behalf and stamp them for the transfer
of your fund into your account . so please here are the names of the
documents below.

A,  Anti-Terrorist certificate

B,  Money Laundry certificate.

C,  Drug free laundry certificate.

Please if you have any of the documents updated up to 8th Jan send them to
me now but if you do not have any let us know i will call the to tell you
his service conditions so that he can get them immediately for the transfer
of your fund i am waiting for your answers back to my office now thank you
for your understanding.

I await your urgent response.

Yours faithfully,
Best Regards,

Mr Patrick Fisher,
